last_episode_to_air.name: Saving Tibbri Road
last_episode_to_air.overview: Asmara, Tania, and Naina come together and take the help of their family and friends to save Tibbri Road from redevelopment. Unforeseen developments sway between joy and heartbreak, determining Tibbri Road's fate and the girl's future.

name: Dil Dosti Dilemma
overview: Asmara’s summer takes an unexpected turn when she is sent to her grandparents’ neighborhood as a form of punishment. To maintain appearances with her friends, she pretends to be in Canada. Amidst the struggles of a traditional setting, she learns new life lessons.

episodes.name: The Holiday
episodes.overview: When privileged Asmara, disowns her Naani due to their class differences in front of her friends. Her livid parents cancel her trip to Canada and send her to live with her Naani and Naana at humble Tibbri Road for the summer.

episodes.name: The Culture Shock
episodes.overview: Asmara tries to adjust to her new lifestyle at Tibbri Road, forming a hesitant friendship with neighbour Rukhsana . At Naani's Chaa Party Asmara makes an explosive entry leaving everyone in shock.

episodes.name: Making New Friends
episodes.overview: After the controversial events of the 'Chaa Party, Asmara reconciles with Naani. She learns of Rukhsana's talent in embroidery and motivates her to start a business but she continues to lie about Canada to her friends

episodes.name: Keeping Secrets
episodes.overview: Naani discovers Asmara's lies, prompting Asmara to leave the house in tears. Wandering aimlessly, Farzaan finds her, facilitating a reconciliation with Naani. Asmara and Farzaan's growing relationship faces obstacles due to her hesitancy.

episodes.name: Tanker Rani
episodes.overview: Farzaan distances himself from Asmara after their last encounter. They eventually reconcile but their romantic moment is disrupted by Akhtar Begum, who reveals a long buried family secret.

episodes.name: The Celebration
episodes.overview: Arshiya and Asmara reconcile. Farzaan, and Rukhsana attend a daawat, where Rukhsana's marriage is arranged. Asmara confronts the family, triggering a revelation. Fed up with all the lies, Asmara tears down the Canada corner.

episodes.name: Saving Tibbri Road
episodes.overview: Asmara, Tania, and Naina come together and take the help of their family and friends to save Tibbri Road from redevelopment. Unforeseen developments sway between joy and heartbreak, determining Tibbri Road's fate and the girl's future.
